revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Col. 1, 2 (ή̣χ[ -> (ή̣κ[, col. 2, 5 space before [ο]ὐ̣[δα]μῶς, 6 [.4αγ] -> [.4] [αγ], 8 [.3].1ξ̣η̣ται·*high-punctus*, 9-10 no addition but superscript, i -> ι, 11 (ἀπε̣[ι]λὴνπρ(ὸς)) -> ἀπε̣[ι]λὴν (πρ(ὸς)), 13 *high-punctus*, 16 εὐβουλ̣ία[ς] reg, 19 ἡγη̣σ̣άμεν· -> ἡγη̣σ̣άμην·*high-punctus*, 21 *high-punctus*, 22 ἀποκ{τει}, 25 ἀνανκαίωι reg, iota subscript, 26 *high-punctus*, 28 *high-punctus*, 30 *high-punctus*, 31 (ἐγνόκαμ(εν)) (ἐγνώκαμ(εν)), κείνησιν reg, 33 *high-punctus*, col. 3, 36 ὑμὼν[ -> ὑμῶν [, 37 space after ὑ[μῖν], 38 space after πατρί[δι], 39 υ[ underdot, 41 space before [σω], 43 space after τ[ὸν], 46 στρα̣[τ.3ε̣.1] -> στρα̣[τ][.3]ε̣.1[, 49 space after ν[ύ]κτωρ̣, 50 ἀπῶσ̣[ι]ν, 51 space before ([ο]ὐ̣δ(ε)), 52 *high-punctus*, ἐποίησ̣α underdot α, not σ, underdot ο in το(ν)), 54 underdot ᾶ, 55 *high-punctus*, 56 underdot α, space after ἄλλων̣, 58 space after ἡμᾶ[ς], 60 60.-, υσφο dot first and last letter, 61 .1 .3 -> .4, 62 vestig[.?] -> vestig, 63 [.3][.?]vestig[.?] -> [.?]vestig, 64 space after ἡμῶν, 65 space after στάσιν, fr. 1, 2 ἡμ[ί]ν perispomenon, reg 4 τεχ̣νικώ: τ, ώ underdot, 5 κ̣ρεμασθεν gravis; 5,6, 8, 1314 abbreviations instead of additions, 7 οὐδ᾽[ no apostrophe, 8 ἀπειλή omit accent, 9 .2(|[.?]|) -> (|[.2]|), 10 ὀν omit breathing, 12 γενήσεται·*high-punctus*, αλλοτρ̣[ add breathing, 13 αρμοστ.1[ add breathing, 15 η̣γησαμε[ add breathing; fr. 3,7-8 [ca.0] -> [.0-1], fr. 5,1 [ca.0] -> [.0-1], *high-punctus*, 2 [ca.0] -> [.0-1], 3 *high-punctus*, 6 *high-punctus*, 8 ].1[*apostrophe* σ̣τ̣[, fr. 6, 4 ]ε̣πι -> ]ε̣ρι, fr. 6,6 abbreviation instead of additions, 7 space after παρέχει, fr. 7, 2 ας̣[ -> ασ[, fr. 8, 4 reg, 6 add omitted line from edition
